changeSet.author: Octavian Ciubotaru
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO person_roles(person_id, roles_id) SELECT p.id, r.id FROM person p, role r WHERE p.username = 'admin' AND r.authority = 'ROLE_ADMIN';
INSERT INTO person_roles(person_id, roles_id) SELECT p.id, r.id FROM person p, role r WHERE p.username = 'fao' AND r.authority = 'ROLE_FOCAL_POINT';
UPDATE person SET organization_id=org.id FROM category org WHERE person.username = 'fao' AND org.dtype = 'Organization' AND org.label = 'FAO';
